definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%). Random numbers range between (0.0 and 1.0). If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.025</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">0.025 x 20 ticks = 50% chance every second that the mob will aggress?</comment></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><comment pinned="false" h="68" w="294">This example will test if the current entity type is the player. If it is true, then it will run whatever you place in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_check_creature_type"><field name="type">UNDEAD</field><value
